name: Mood Tracker
description: Track and reflect on your emotional state

onSelect.message: Let's check in with your emotions. All feelings are welcome here 💜

onStart.message: Take a deep breath... how are you feeling right now? 🌸

onComplete.message: Thank you for being so aware of your emotions. You're building emotional intelligence! 💎

onSave.message: Mood tracked! Your feelings are valid and important 💝

sections.title: Current mood
sections.placeholder: How are you feeling right now? (Use the mood wheel to select)

onStart.message: Take a moment to truly feel... what's present for you right now? 💭

onComplete.message: Thank you for naming your feelings. That's brave 💜

hints: Try the emotion wheel - start broad, then get specific
It's okay to feel multiple things at once
Where do you feel this in your body?

sections.title: What triggered this mood?
sections.placeholder: Describe what led to these feelings...

onStart.message: Let's gently explore... what brought these feelings up? 🔍

onComplete.message: Identifying triggers is key to understanding yourself! 🌱

hints: Was it a specific event, person, or thought?
Did something remind you of a past experience?
What happened right before you felt this way?
Is there a pattern you're noticing?

75.message: This level of self-awareness is incredible! 💎

sections.title: Physical sensations
sections.placeholder: How does your body feel? Any tension, energy, fatigue?

onStart.message: Your body holds wisdom. What is it telling you? 🌸

onComplete.message: Mind-body connection recognized! This is powerful awareness 💪

hints: Scan from head to toe - what do you notice?
Is your breathing shallow or deep?

sections.title: How I'm coping
sections.placeholder: What are you doing to manage these feelings?

onStart.message: What helps you navigate these feelings? 💫

onComplete.message: You have coping strategies! That's resilience in action! 💪

onSkip.message: That's okay. Sometimes we need help finding coping strategies 💜

hints: What healthy coping strategies are you using?
Who or what brings you comfort?
What would help you feel better?
What worked for you in the past?

75.message: Your emotional toolkit is growing! So proud! 🌟
